pkgmetadata.longdescription: Changepoint Additive Models for Time Series Omics Data // Provides a comprehensive framework for time series omics analysis, integrating changepoint detection, smooth and shape- constrained trends, and uncertainty quantification. It supports gene- and transcript-level inferences, p-value aggregation for improved power, and both case-only and case-control designs. It includes an interactive 'shiny' interface. The methods are described in Yates et al. (2024) doi:10.1101/2024.12.22.630003.
